segments.text: Hi . You look excited . What's happening ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I just heard that our school will hold a singing contest in 5 days .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . This is a great chance for me to show off my beautiful voice .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I heard that the winner gets a Panda Radio .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you think you have a chance ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A chance ? Not just a chance , I'm a hundred percent certain.Everyone says my voice is beautiful .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But you haven't practised all that much .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I still have 5 days to practise . It's in the bag !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't be too sure . You're still going to need some help .
segments.speaker: S2
